main.name: Samuel Character
main.bio: Currently, a senior pursuing a degree in Computer Science,Geographic Information Systems & IT at The University of North Texas and I am currently a freelancing Software Developer. I am a self-motivated individual with experience in coding software applications and web-development in a progressive and challenging environment. I strive to improve upon my strong analytical skills, problem solving skills, presentation skills, and critical thinking ability to assist colleagues solve their complex problems by keeping up with the constantly changing industry demands.
